definition: nut (female component of nut and bolt)

sentences.english: Remove the upper suspension arm nut and bolt at the axle bracket.
sentences.chinese: 从车轴支架上拆去上端悬吊臂螺帽和螺栓。

sentences.english: Install adjusting nut to the tensioner rod and adjust parking brakes .
sentences.chinese: 将调整螺帽安装到拉伸器杆并调整手刹车。

sentences.english: Remove lower bolts that attach bumper to bumper support brackets.
sentences.chinese: 拆去连结保险杆到保险杆支架的下部螺帽。

sentences.english: Remove nuts, U-bolts and spring bracket from axle.
sentences.chinese: 由车轴拆下螺帽，U型螺栓和弹簧支架。

sentences.english: Why don't you try tightening the pinion nut first?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么不先扭紧小齿轮的螺帽？

sentences.english: Remove a shaft nut and washer.
The nut has been worked on the spindle.
sentences.chinese: 螺帽已经拧在轴心上了。

sentences.english: Position locknut over top of fuel pump module.
sentences.chinese: 将锁定螺帽放在燃油泵模组上。

sentences.english: The spindle nut must be tightened using a paper washer.
sentences.chinese: 必须用纸垫圈使心轴螺帽紧固。

sentences.english: He soon came up with a nut which had fallen off.
sentences.chinese: 一会儿他来了，拿着一颗脱落下来的螺帽。

sentences.english: Every machine is held together by its nuts and bolts.
sentences.chinese: 每台机器都是由螺帽和螺栓所连接在一起的。

sentences.english: Made of Cr-V alloy steel. Fully-hardened with chamfering.
sentences.chinese: 钢制造，整体热处理，尾端倒角方便插入螺帽。

sentences.english: Even the wrinkles or folds are on the nut just like the neo-cortex.
sentences.chinese: 即使是坚果上的皱纹或褶皱上的螺帽就像新皮层。

definition: nut (female component of nut and bolt)
bolt (male component of nut and bolt)/screw
to spread litter in a cowshed, pigsty etc
nut (female component of nut and bolt)
nut (female component of nut and bolt)
